casebody.data:
JARRETT
v.
JARRETT 354P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 27, 2016 G. Russell Kornegay, III, Attorney at Law, Preston O. Odom, III, Attorney at Law, John Paul Tsahakis, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Jarrett, William Andrew. Catrina Jarrett, Celia Pistolis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Jarrett, Catrina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of September 2016 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of September 2016."
